      • getLocalTopicURL

        public static java.net.URL getLocalTopicURL(org.w3c.dom.Element topicref)
        Returns the URL of the topic referenced by specified topicref, if this topic is a local one (that is, format=dita, scope=local).

        Specified topicref is expected to come from a simple map, where all attributes and metadata have been cascaded.

      • doGetLocalTopicURL

        public static java.net.URL doGetLocalTopicURL(org.w3c.dom.Element topicref)
                                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getScope

        public static java.lang.String getScope(org.w3c.dom.Element topicref,
                                        java.lang.String href)
        Return the scope of specified topicref. Never returns null; fallbacks to "local".

      • getFormat

        public static java.lang.String getFormat(org.w3c.dom.Element topicref,
                                         java.lang.String href)
        Return the format of specified topicref. May return null.

      • guessFormat

        public static java.lang.String guessFormat(java.lang.String href)
        Returns the lower-case DITA format (dita, ditamap, ditaval, html, etc) corresponding to the file extension of specified relative or absolute URL. Returns null if such format cannot be determined.

      • getTopicId

        public static java.lang.String getTopicId(java.net.URL url)
        Returns the topic ID referenced in the fragment of specified URL. Returns null if there is no such ID.

        Example returns foo for file:///tmp/bar.dita#foo/gee.

      • inheritFormat

        public static java.lang.String inheritFormat(org.w3c.dom.Element topicref,
